text: Barauni IOC Township is a census town at Barauni in Begusarai district in the state of Bihar, India. ==Demographics== India census, Barauni IOC Township had a population of 13,825. Males constitute 55% of the population and females 45%. Barauni IOC Township has an average literacy rate of 82%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 58% of the males and 42% of females literate. 13% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== by:-rajnikant kumar Category:Cities and towns in Begusarai district Category:Barauni Category:Townships in India
title: Barauni IOC Township
